'''''Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 32 [[Monetoo]] and complete the graffiti in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]].
